definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Protected by lamellar armour, giving these horse archers better protection against enemy attacks.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德弓騎兵身穿鱗甲，能有效抵禦敵軍攻擊。

sentences.english: Dwarves took the primordial methods of producing titanscale armor from the titans and giants.
sentences.chinese: 矮人用來自泰坦和巨人的上古工藝製作泰坦鱗甲。

sentences.english: I'm touching you the river Thames, as if touching scales of an ancient fish.
sentences.chinese: 我觸摸你泰晤士河，宛如觸摸一條古老的魚之鱗甲。

sentences.english: They were heavily armored horsemen in what I believe was usually heavy scale armor.
sentences.chinese: 他們是重裝騎兵，我想他們通常穿着鱗甲。

sentences.english: Mundane scale armor uses metal plates.
South American catfish having the body covered with bony plates.
sentences.chinese: 身上有鱗甲的南美鮎魚。

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
to move about/to go from place to place/roving/mobile
